Actions.Name: Cut Through
Actions.Effects: The Swordmaster may teleport to any point on the line after this ability resolves.

Actions.Name: Duelist's Fervor
Actions.Description: The Swordmaster marks a foe in range 4.
Actions.Mark: While a foe is marked, the Swordmaster gains stealth at the start of their turn, deals bonus damage, and may dash 2 after any attack. These effects turn off if the marked target is adjacent to any ally.

Actions.Name: Hone
Actions.Description: The next attack from this character becomes a critical hit on hit (+[D]).
